endpoints.description: Retrieve the overall health status of the monitored system.
Create a subscription to receive notifications for emerging issues.
Remove a specific notification subscription by its ID.
Fetch diagnostic logs to assist with root cause analysis.
Initiate a deep analysis process for diagnosing a specific issue.
Access metrics to assess and improve system reliability.
Request system optimization procedures to enhance uptime.
Retrieve a list of active alerts and warnings for the system.
Acknowledge a specific alert to change its status.
Analyze past failures to identify recurring patterns.
